title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital (Huntington, WV) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: The interview was done in a professional manner. Very friendly. Answered all my questions and was upfront about expectations of the unit. The interview lasted a little over an hour.
Interview Questions: How would I solve a conflict on the unit?

title: Certified Child Life Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital (Huntington, WV) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with the child life clinical coordinator and 7 interdisciplinary members within the hospital. The interview was conducted in person and lasted approximately an hour. Members involved in the interview took time to ask questions and allowed time for interviewee questions.

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital (Huntington, WV) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: interview was smooth with basic nursing related questions! I felt my anxiety ease as soon as I met the people interviewing because they made it a friendly process. I applied while still in my senior year of nursing school as a new graduate.
Interview Questions:
Why did you want to become a nurse? 
What sets you apart from someone else?

title: Student Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The interview went great, said I would get a call, I called a couple times after a week and they said they were still in the process of making a decision and here we are 6 months later. No call nor email.
Interview Questions: Most of the questions were geared towards situations.

title: Radiology Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital
Interview Descriptions: 3 directors interviewed me in a board meeting room. They were very friendly and easy to talk to. They were thorough in asking and answering questions. Said they would make a decision in a week.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you instead of the other candidates?

title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Very pleasant.  Felt at ease.  Great people.  Interviewers seemed interested in my experience and gave a detailed overview of position and expectations of the job vacancy.  Left feeling good about the interview.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital (Huntington, WV) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: When I applied it took over 7 months to get a call back from HR to arrange an interview. The interview itself went great and the nurse manager was thorough in answering all of my questions and giving me a tour of the facility. The issue is it takes so long to even get a call back that most candidates would already have moved on.
Interview Questions: What skills I had to offer to their unit

title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Called to come in for interview and whole process was very disorganized. Had to sit around and wait because they were running behind that day. Then once interview started it was very basic questions. Nothing how I thought it would go
Interview Questions: Where do I see myself in the next 5 years?

title: Lab Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital (Huntington, WV) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very good and relaxed.  The supervisor understood that I was nervous, and went out of her way to make it as relaxed as possible, yet she did get the information she needed re my skills and experience.

title: RN-Telemetry/Step-down Unit Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Cabell Huntington Hospital (Huntington, WV) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: Applications are submitted online and sometimes they don't process through, so go ahead and visit the unit(s) with resume' in hand and ask to speak with the nurse manager. Dress appropriately! I know several girls who got their dream jobs because of this.
Interview Questions: What is your greatest weakness? and "If your CNA hasn't done the task you expected of them, how do you handle this?
